author: COMSOL
description: In this tutorial model, different methods for modeling pretensioned bolts are explored. The bolts are modeled using both solid and beam elements. Different types of couplings between the bolts and the clamped components are shown. The bolts are pretensioned sequentially, using different load levels.
label: bolt_pretension_tutorial.mph
name: root
